    • Uses of NetBase in org.nodex.java.core.net

      Subclasses of NetBase in org.nodex.java.core.net 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetClient
      NetClient is an asynchronous factory for TCP or SSL connections
      class  NetClientBase
      Abstract base class for net clients
      class  NetServer
      Encapsulates a server that understands TCP or SSL.
      class  NetServerBase
      Abstract base class for net servers
      Methods in org.nodex.java.core.net that return NetBase 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NetBase NetBase.setKeyStorePassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      Set the password for the SSL key store.
      NetBase NetBase.setKeyStorePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to the SSL key store.
      NetBase NetBase.setReceiveBufferSize(int size)
      Set the TCP receive buffer size for connections created by this instance to size in bytes.
      NetBase NetBase.setReuseAddress(boolean reuse)
      Set the TCP reuseAddress setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      NetBase NetBase.setSendBufferSize(int size)
      Set the TCP send buffer size for connections created by this instance to size in bytes.
      NetBase NetBase.setSoLinger(boolean linger)
      Set the TCP soLinger setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      NetBase NetBase.setSSL(boolean ssl)
      If ssl is true, this signifies that any connections will be SSL connections.
      NetBase NetBase.setTCPKeepAlive(boolean keepAlive)
      Set the TCP keepAlive setting for connections created by this instance to keepAlive.
      NetBase NetBase.setTcpNoDelay(boolean tcpNoDelay)
      If tcpNoDelay is set to true then Nagle's algorithm will turned off for the TCP connections created by this instance.
      NetBase NetBase.setTrafficClass(int trafficClass)
      Set the TCP trafficClass setting for connections created by this instance to reuse.
      NetBase NetBase.setTrustStorePassword(java.lang.String pwd)
      Set the password for the SSL trust store.
      NetBase NetBase.setTrustStorePath(java.lang.String path)
      Set the path to the SSL trust store.
